title: E-sports: Tunisia aims to become a major player in digital economy
description:
Tunisia is making its mark on the rapidly growing African video game and e-sports market. The National Committee for Game Development (CNDD) is leading efforts to professionalize the sector and position Tunisia as a key player in the digital economy.

title: Indonesia Aims to Finalize Trade Agreement with Tunisia in 2026
description:
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Indonesia’s Minister of Trade, Budi Santoso, announced plans to conclude the Indonesia-Tunisia Preferential Trade Agreement (IT-PTA) next year, following the completion of negotiations. According to Budi, the agreement is ready and only awaits formal signatures.
